{"id":1311909883,"question_id":3264,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"2 months, 3 weeks","timestamp":1720285722,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"119 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1311909883/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Maximum Points After Enemy Battles","memory":"76 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    long long maximumPoints(vector<int>& enemyEnergies, int currentEnergy) {\n        sort(enemyEnergies.begin(),enemyEnergies.end());\n        long long int sum=currentEnergy;\n        for(int i=enemyEnergies.size()-1;i>=1;i--){\n            sum+=enemyEnergies[i];\n        }\n        if(currentEnergy<enemyEnergies[0]){\n            return 0;\n        }\n        return sum/enemyEnergies[0];\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"maximum-points-after-enemy-battles","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
